description: First sheet of the 2022 California Green Building Standards Code (CalGreen) Residential Mandatory Measures checklist (July 2024 Supplement). Covers Divisions 4.1 through 4.5: Planning and Design, Energy Efficiency, Water Efficiency and Conservation, Material Conservation and Resource Efficiency, and Environmental Quality.
key_content: 2022 CalGreen Residential Mandatory Measures, Sheet 1 (July 2024 Supplement)
Division 4.1: Planning and Design — site development, storm water, grading, EV charging
Division 4.2: Energy Efficiency — references California Energy Code
Division 4.3: Water Efficiency — kitchen faucets, lavatory faucets, showerheads, outdoor water (MWELO)
Division 4.4: Material Conservation — enhanced durability, construction waste 65% diversion
Division 4.5: Environmental Quality — pollutant control, definitions
Storm water drainage and retention during construction (4.106.2)
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: specific GPM/GPF flow rates for fixtures (text too small)
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: checkbox completion status for most items (obscured by watermark)
NOT SHOWN: specific fixture flow rates (GPM for faucets, GPF for toilets) — values present but not legible
NOT SHOWN: exhaust fan specs (may be on Sheet 2)

drawing_zones.content: Chapter 3 Sections 301-302: Scope, applicability, mixed occupancy
Division 4.1 Planning and Design: definitions, site development (4.106), EV charging (4.106.4.1)
Division 4.3 Water Efficiency and Conservation: indoor water use (4.303), outdoor water (4.304)
Division 4.4 Material Conservation (4.405-4.408): waste diversion 65%, Division 4.5 Environmental Quality (4.501-4.504)
Vertical title block: New Detached ADU, address, CalGreen AIA Checklist, AIA.1

title_block_address: 1232 N. Jefferson St., Unit 'A', Placentia, CA 92870
